description: A no-nonsense chromoly fork for 700c disc brake setups. Threaded eyelets and rack mounts ready this steel-is-real unit for winter riding and/or long haul tours.Steer tube is 1 x 1/8in.Designed for 700c wheelsets.45mm offset.Only compatible with disc brake setups (no rim brake caliper mounts).Low-rider rack mounts for touring or commuting setups.Threaded eyelets for fenders or a rack.Axle to crown length is 382mm.
name: MEC Cro/Moly Disc Only 700c Fork
